message.body: Hey are you still up for going to Haverford house tonight for dinner?
Yeah! We will be back by midnight right? Also what time do we need to leave?
Gosh I hope so -I was hoping to be back by 9 or 10 at the latest. Let me check the train schedule and ill let you know. Probs around 6ish

Ok so if we take the r5 and then the market Frankfurt line we will need to leave about 5:30ish. This way is slightly more expensive. If we take the r100 we can leave take the 5:30 or 6:00 and then the el. This way is cheaper but we need 6 one dollar bills. Also google maps is being a poop and refusing to tell me which r100 train we should take.
Okay I don't think I have six dollar bills...either way is fine!
I don't have exact change either (only twenties). We could take the r5 there are make change on the train and then decide which way to go back when we leave.
5:52. We can meet at the top of the path by Barclay at 5:35 or 5:40 ish?
